description.brief: hector_geotiff provides a node that can be used to save occupancy grid map, robot trajectory and object of interest data to RoboCup Rescue compliant GeoTiff images

package.description: hector_geotiff provides a node that can be used to save occupancy grid map, robot trajectory and object of interest data to RoboCup Rescue compliant GeoTiff images
package.author: Stefan Kohlbrecher
